abstract: Student Opinion | What cartoons - present or past, print or animated - are your favorites? Why?
snippet: Student Opinion | What cartoons - present or past, print or animated - are your favorites? Why?
lead_paragraph: Cartoons are in the news this week, with recent articles about Arab animators, the new incarnation of Beavis and Butt-head and veteran print cartoonist Lynda Barry and her creativity workshops. What cartoons - present or past, print or animated - are your favorites? Why?
